pollers

Class ColorSensorPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pollers.ColorSensorPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ColorSensorPoller
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is a "Color Sensor Poller". It controls a color sensor. It can control how often it gets data, whether or not it is enabled, which color mode is set, etc. It is used to get data from color sensors
    Author:
    AsherW
